{{velocity}} #if("$!{request.format}" == 'csv') #set($entries = $services.query.hql("select obj.name from BaseObject obj where obj.className = 'Glossary.Code.GlossaryClass' and obj.name like :glossarySpace group by obj.name order by obj.name asc").bindValue('glossarySpace', "${request.glossary}.%").execute())
## Build a map of entries which will contain, for each language, the available translations of a Glossary entry #set($entriesMap = {}) #foreach ($entry in $entries) ## Get every transaltions corresponding to this glossary entry #set($translations = $services.query.hql("select doc.title, doc.language, doc.content, doc.syntaxId from XWikiDocument doc where doc.fullName = :entry").bindValue('entry', $entry).execute()) #foreach($translation in $translations) #if ($stringtool.isBlank($translation[1])) #set($language = 'default') #else #set($language = $translation[1]) #end
#if (!$entriesMap.containsKey($language)) #set($discard = $entriesMap.put($language, {})) #end
#set($discard = $entriesMap.get($language).put($entry, { 'title': $translation[0], 'content': $services.rendering.render($services.rendering.parse($translation[2], $translation[3]), 'plain/1.0') })) #end #end
##Â We should now have registered every existing translation columns that exist in the Glossary ## Make sure that the language column 'default' is the first one. If no default column is in the entry map, then the one we added by default in the language columns initialization will be removed #set($languageColumns = ['default']) #set($discard = $languageColumns.addAll($entriesMap.keySet())) #set($discard = $languageColumns.remove($languageColumns.lastIndexOf('default')))
#set($rows = []) ## Create the first row of the export #set($row = $services.localization.render('glossary.export.id').replaceAll('"', '""')) #set($row = "${escapetool.quote}${row}${escapetool.quote}") #foreach($languageColumn in $languageColumns) #set($translatedLanguageColumn = $xcontext.locale.forLanguageTag($languageColumn).getDisplayName($xcontext.locale)) #if($translatedLanguageColumn.equals($languageColumn)) #set($translatedLanguageColumn = $services.localization.render("glossary.export.locale.${languageColumn}").replaceAll('"', '""')) #end #set($escapedTranslatedLanguageContent = $services.localization.render('glossary.export.csv.content', [$translatedLanguageColumn]).replaceAll('"', '""')) #set($row = "$!{row};${escapetool.quote}${translatedLanguageColumn}${escapetool.quote};${escapetool.quote}${escapedTranslatedLanguageContent}${escapetool.quote}") #end #set($discard = $rows.add($row))
## Create the next content rows #foreach($entry in $entries) #set($row = $entry.replaceAll('"', '""')) #set($row = "${escapetool.quote}${row}${escapetool.quote}") #foreach ($language in $languageColumns) #if ($entriesMap.get($language).containsKey($entry)) #set($escapedEntryTitle = $entriesMap.get($language).get($entry).get('title').replaceAll('"', '""')) #set($escapedEntryContent = $entriesMap.get($language).get($entry).get('content').replaceAll('"', '""')) #set($row = "${row};${escapetool.quote}${escapedEntryTitle}${escapetool.quote};${escapetool.quote}${escapedEntryContent}${escapetool.quote}") #else #set($row = "${row};;") #end #end #set($discard = $rows.add($row)) #end
$response.setContentType('application/csv') $xcontext.response.setHeader('Content-disposition', 'attachment; filename=export.csv') $response.getCharacterEncoding() #set($bytes = $stringtool.join($rows, $escapetool.n).getBytes($response.getCharacterEncoding())) $response.outputStream.write($bytes) $response.setContentLength($bytes.size()) $response.flushBuffer() #set($discard = $xcontext.setFinished(true)) #end {{/velocity}}
